ingredient_list: 2 medium fully ripe avocados, peeled, pitted
1 (16 ounce) container BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat Sour Cream
directions_instructions: Mash avocados with fork or potato masher until smooth.
Add remaining ingredients; mix until well blended. Cover. Refrigerate 1 hour or until chilled.
Serve with WHEAT THINS Snack Crackers, cut-up fresh vegetables or chips.
nutrition_summary: 54 calories; protein 1g; carbohydrates 3.4g; fat 4.3g; cholesterol 9mg; sodium 95.1mg. Full Nutrition
